attributes.action: ask her majesty Queen Elizabeth  ll for the dissolution of parliament and to call an early general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe The present parliament has lost public confidence and I also dismiss claims that the public wants the present government to concentrate on the economic crisis as apposed to calling an early election.
 I believe that most people want this current parliament dissolved immediately and want their opinions to be shown at the polls

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
